data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Trujillo, Venezuela by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Trujillo, Venezuela
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Trujillo, Venezuela.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Trujillo.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, help get online Bibles and Bible apps onto the phones of the 501,175 people who claim to know you, so they can read everyday.
Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Turk people.
Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Trujillo, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Trujillo, Venezuela and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Trujillo, Venezuela that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

location.name: Trujillo
location.people_groups_list: Yaruro, Han Chinese, Mandarin, Jew, Dutch, Chaima, Cuiba
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Yaruro (8,400), Han Chinese, Mandarin (900), Jew, Dutch (200), Chaima (12,000), Cuiba (400)
